banner.tittel: Application for survivor’s pension or transitional benefit

forside.tittel: Apply for survivor’s pension or transitional benefit

omYtelsene.innhold: If your spouse, partner or cohabitant has died, you may be entitled to a survivor’s pension or transitional benefit for survivors. You may also be entitled to support if you were previously married to, in a partnership with or cohabiting with the deceased. We will assess whether you are entitled to a survivor’s pension or transitional benefit, based on your situation. How much money you will receive depends on your current income.

papirsoeknad.innhold: If you are already receiving an old-age pension or disability benefit, you can apply for a survivor’s supplement. To apply for a survivor’s supplement, you must use

barnepensjon.tittel: You can also apply for a children’s pension
barnepensjon.innhold: If you have a joint child under the age of 18 with the deceased, the child(ren) may be entitled to a children’s pension. You can apply for both survivor’s pension and children’s pension using this application.

uthentingAvInfo.tittel: We gather the information we need
uthentingAvInfo.innhold: To process your application we need information about you, the deceased, any children and (as applicable) your cohabiting partner. We gather:

innholdListe.li1: Personal information from the Norwegian National Registry (“Folkeregisteret”)
innholdListe.li2: Information about your income from the Norwegian Tax Administration (“Skatteetaten”)
innholdListe.li3: Information about your work situation from the NAV State Register of Employers and Employees (the Aa Register)
innholdListe.li4: Information about other support you are receiving from NAV
innholdListe.li5: As applicable, information from foreign social security authorities

uthentingAvInfo.infotekst: We are currently working on improving this application. For the time being, you have to enter most of the information manually.

lenke1.tekst: Read more about how we process your personal data

lenke2.tekst: Read more about data protection and security on the nav.no website

samtykke.innhold:
You must provide us with the correct information so that we can process your application. 
If you receive money that you are not entitled to because you withheld information or provided incorrect information, you usually have to pay this money back.
samtykke.bekreftelse: I, {{navn}}, hereby confirm that the information I provide is correct and complete.

dinSituasjon.ingress: The size of your survivor’s pension depends on your earned income. We calculate your expected income on the basis of your current work situation and your previous income.
dinSituasjon.ingenJobbBeskrivelsePlaceholder: Describe your situation in more detail

naavaerendeUtdanning.navn: The name of the education you are taking
naavaerendeUtdanning.navnPlaceholder: For example: upper secondary education, apprenticeship, nursing programme

utdanning.hoyesteFullfoerteUtdanning: What is your highest completed level of education?
utdanning.annenUtdanningPlaceholder: For example: courses, individual years at university or college

selvstendig.beskrivelse: What is the name of the company?

forventerEndretInntekt.svar: Do you expect your income to change in the next 12 months?
forventerEndretInntekt.beskrivelse: What is the reason for these changes?
forventerEndretInntekt.beskrivelsePlaceholder: For example: change in expected income or operation of your business

forventerEndretInntekt.svar: Do you expect your income to change in the next 12 months?
forventerEndretInntekt.beskrivelse: What is the reason for these changes?
forventerEndretInntekt.beskrivelsePlaceholder: For example: increase or decrease in income

andreYtelser.ingress: Some benefits from NAV are regarded as income and have an impact on how much survivor’s pension you are entitled to. Disability benefit, old-age pension and contractual early retirement pension (AFP) cannot be combined with survivor’s pension.

kravOmAnnenStonad.svar: Have you applied for other benefits that you have not received an answer to yet?

annenPensjon.svar: Are you receiving or have you applied for a contractual early retirement pension (AFP) or other pension from someone other than NAV?
annenPensjon.placeholder: For example: Skandia, KLP, SPK, Oslo pensjonsforsikring

mottarPensjonUtland.svar: Do you receive a pension from a country other than Norway?
mottarPensjonUtland.hvorfor: We need this information in order to be able to assess your membership of the Norwegian National Insurance Scheme
mottarPensjonUtland.hvaSlagsPensjonPlaceholder: For example: old-age pension, survivor’s pension
mottarPensjonUtland.bruttobeloepPrAar: Annual amount before tax in the country’s currency

omDeg.advarsel: If the information we have about you is incorrect, you must change it in the National Registry.
omDeg.valgfritt: All fields must be filled in, apart from those marked as optional.
omDeg.bostedsadresseBekreftet: Do you live at this address?
omDeg.oppholdHvorfor: If you spend a prolonged period in a country other than Norway, this may affect whether you get a survivor’s pension and how much money you get.
omDeg.medlemFolketrygdenUtland: Are you a member of the Norwegian National Insurance Scheme during your period outside Norway?
omDeg.flyktningHvorfor: If you are registered as a refugee with the Norwegian Directorate of Immigration (UDI), this may affect whether you get a survivor’s pension and how much money you get.

utbetalingsInformasjon.bankkontoType: Do you want the pension to be paid into a Norwegian bank account or a foreign bank account?
utbetalingsInformasjon.kontonummer: Enter the Norwegian bank account number for payment
utbetalingsInformasjon.informasjon: You can only have one bank account number registered with NAV.
utbetalingsInformasjon.ibanHjelpetekst: IBAN stands for International Bank Account Number and is an international standard for bank account numbers.
utbetalingsInformasjon.swift: The bank’s SWIFT code or BIC
utbetalingsInformasjon.swiftHjelpetekst: BIC stands for Bank Identifier Code, and is a unique code that identifies the bank. The BIC, which in some countries is called the SWIFT code, is required when making payments to a number of countries.

avdoed.datoForDoedsfallet: State the date of their death

forholdTilAvdoede.relasjon: Your relationship with the deceased at the time of their death
forholdTilAvdoede.fellesBarn: Do you have or have you had children together?
forholdTilAvdoede.samboereMedFellesBarn: Were you cohabiting partners and had children together before you married?
forholdTilAvdoede.tidligereGift: Were you previously married to the deceased?
forholdTilAvdoede.datoForInngaattSamboerskap: We lived together as cohabiting partners
forholdTilAvdoede.omsorgForBarn: Were you caring for the deceased’s children at the time of their death?
forholdTilAvdoede.mottokBidrag: Were you being supported by the deceased at the time of their death?

nySivilstatus.beskrivelse: If you have remarried or moved in with a new partner, this may affect whether you can receive survivor’s pension and the size of the pension.

samboerskap.hattBarnEllerVaertGift: Do you have or have you had children together or were you previously married?

samboer.harInntekt.svar: Does your cohabiting partner have any income?

boddEllerJobbetUtland.ingress: We need to know if the deceased has lived or worked outside Norway. This may both affectthe size of the survivor’s pension you receive and give you pension rights from other countries.
boddEllerJobbetUtland.svar: Had the deceased lived or worked in a country other than Norway after the age of 16?

oppholdUtland.medlemFolketrygd: Was the deceased a member of the Norwegian National Insurance Scheme during this period?
oppholdUtland.medlemFolketrygdHjelpetekst: We need to know if the deceased was a member of the Norwegian National Insurance Scheme in order to be able to determine whether you are entitled to a survivor’s pension.

mottokPensjon.beskrivelse: Enter any pension the deceased received from this country (optional)
mottokPensjon.beskrivelsePlaceholder: Per year, in the country’s currency

haddePensjonsgivendeInntekt.svar: Did the deceased have any income from self-employment at the time of their death?

selvstendigNaeringsdrivende.ingress: We need to know if the deceased had any income as a self-employed person. This is important when we calculate the size of your survivor’s pension. We obtain information about other income directly.
selvstendigNaeringsdrivende.beskrivelse: Enter the deceased’s income from self-employment from the calendar year before their death (optional)

harAvtjentMilitaerTjeneste.svar: Has the deceased carried out compulsory military or civil service for Norway that lasted at least 30 days?
harAvtjentMilitaerTjeneste.hjelpetekst: This may result in earnings that are to be included in the calculation of your survivor’s pension

omDenAvdoede.doedsfallAarsak: Was the death caused by an occupational injury or occupational illness?
omDenAvdoede.doedsfallAarsakHvorfor: If the death was caused by an approved occupational injury or occupational illness, this may affect whether you get a survivor’s pension and the size of the pension.

omBarn.informasjon:
If you have or have had children, this may affect your right to a survivor’s pension. You therefore need to enter all your children, regardless of how old they are. This applies to children you share with the deceased (“joint children”), the deceased’s children from another relationship, and your children from another relationship. 

If you have a joint child who is under the age of 18 with the deceased, you can also apply for a children’s pension here. Children over the age of 18 must apply for the pension themselves.
omBarn.foedselsnummer: The child’s Norwegian national identity number or D number
omBarn.relasjon: Who are the parents of the child?
omBarn.relasjonHjelpetekst: We need to know if this is a child you share with the deceased, the deceased’s child from another relationship, or your child from another relationship.

harBarnetVerge.svar: Has a guardian been appointed for the child?

omBarn.dagligOmsorg: Do you have the daily care for this child?

barnepensjon.soekerInfo: You can apply for a children’s pension for children under the age of 18 you share with the deceased (“joint children”).
barnepensjon.soekerCheckboks: Yes, I am applying for a children’s pension for the child

kontonummer.svar: Should the children’s pension be paid to the same bank account that you have previously provided the details for?
kontonummer.informasjon: You can add a separate bank account number for the child.
kontonummer.kontonummer: Enter the Norwegian bank account number for payment of children’s pension

forskuddstrekk.svar: Do you want us to deduct tax from the children’s pension?
forskuddstrekk.hjelpetekst: Children’s pensions are taxable, but we do not deduct tax from the payment amount unless we are instructed to do so. If you have any questions about tax, you must contact the Norwegian Tax Administration (“Skatteetaten”).

bosattUtland.svar: Does the child live in a country other than Norway?

omBarn.gravidEllerNyligFoedt: Are you expecting a child or do you have children who have not yet been registered in the Norwegian National Registry?

oppsummering.beskrivelse:
Please read through the summary of your application before submitting it.
If you need to make any changes, you can go back and make them.
oppsummering.feilVedSending: An error occurred while submitting. Please wait and try again. Contact customer service if the error persists.

soeknadKvittering.kontakt: If we need more information to be able to process your application, we will contact you.

endring.tittel: You must notify us of any changes
endring.informasjon: You must notify us promptly if any important changes occur in your life. Examples include:

endringsListe.sivilstatus: if you get married, get a cohabiting partner, or have children with your cohabiting partner
endringsListe.inntekt: if there is a change in your income
endringsListe.bosted: if you are going to move to or spend a prolonged period of time in another country

rettigheter.informasjon: You can read more about your rights and obligations at

seSaken.tittel: Check the satus of your application

informasjon.innhold2: you will find a notification confirming that we have received your application. You can always check
informasjon.innhold3: to see if your application has been processed.

lenke.tekst: Here you can check the expected case processing time.

andreStoenader.tittel: You may also be entitled to other benefits
andreStoenader.informasjon: Do you have children together? If so, you may also be entitled to support under other schemes:

skolepenger.tekst: Allowance to cover tuition fees for a surviving spouse

barnetilsyn.tekst: Child care benefit for a surviving spouse

tillegg.tekst: Supplemental benefits for a surviving spouse

andreStoenader.andreInformasjon: Are you taking education or looking for work? If so, you may also be entitled to support for child care and expenses you have in connection with your education or job seeking:

sideIkkeFunnet.alert: The page you have requested does not exist.

kanIkkeSoeke.gjenlevendeEllerBarnepensjon: Sorry, you cannot apply for a survivor’s pension or children’s pension because you are under the age of 18.
kanIkkeSoeke.gjenlevende: Sorry, you cannot apply for a survivor’s pension.

info.gjenlevendeEllerBarnepensjon: To apply for a survivor’s pension, or apply for a children’s pension on behalf of a child, you must be over 18 years of age.
info.gjenlevende: To receive a survivor’s pension, you must be between 18 and 67 years of age. Do you want to apply for a survivor’s supplement to your old-age pension? You can read more about this on the old-age pension pages.

barnepensjon.tekst: Here you can read more about who can get a children’s pension and how to apply.

alderspensjon.tekst: Here you can read more about who can get an old-age pension and how to apply.

avbrytModal.spoersmaal: Do you want to quit this application?
avbrytModal.svarNei: No, I want to continue applying
avbrytModal.svarJa: Yes, I want to quit now and continue later
avbrytModal.svarSlett: Yes, I want to quit now and clear the application form
avbrytModal.informasjon: You can continue now or later. Your application will be saved for 72 hours.

hvorforSpoerVi: Why are we asking you about this?

utdanning.grunnskole: Compulsory education (primary and lower secondary school)
utdanning.videregående: Upper secondary education or high school

felles.fnrDnr: Norwegian national identity number or D number

endreSvarOppsummering.om-deg-og-avdoed: Change answers about you and the deceased

fortsettSoeknad.beskrivelse: Do you want to continue filling in the application you started earlier?
fortsettSoeknad.fortsettSoeknad: Yes, I want to carry on from where I left off
fortsettSoeknad.startPaaNytt: No, I want to start a new application

feil.tittel: To proceed, you must correct the following:

hovedytelse.required: A main benefit must be selected

bostedsadresseBekreftet.required: You must confirm whether this is your current residential address or not

svar.required: State whether the deceased has ever lived or worked in a country other than Norway

beskrivelse.required: Enter how much pension was received

medlemFolketrygd.required: State whether the deceased was a member of the Norwegian National Insurance Scheme during their stay in a country other than Norway

oppholdsland.required: Enter your current country of residence

medlemFolketrygdenUtland.required: State whether you are a member of the Norwegian National Insurance Scheme during your stay in a country other than Norway

doedsfallAarsak.required: State whether the death was due to an occupational injury or illness

relasjon.required: State your relationship to the deceased

fellesBarn.required: State whether you have (or had) joint children

omsorgForBarn.required: State whether you were caring for the deceased’s children at the time of his/her death

tidligereGift.required: State whether you were previously married to the deceased

samboereMedFellesBarn.required: State whether you were cohabiting partners and had joint children together before you married

datoForInngaattSamboerskap.required: Specify when you started living together

mottokBidrag.required: State whether you were being supported by the deceased at the time of their death

mottokEktefelleBidrag.required: State whether you were receiving alimony

svar.required: State whether the deceased was self-employed

beskrivelse.pattern: Enter valid income from self-employment (digits only)

svar.required: State whether you expect any changes in your income

orgnr.required: You must enter a valid organisation number. 9 digits
orgnr.minLength: The organisation number must be 9 digits

orgnr.required: You must enter a valid organisation number. 9 digits
orgnr.minLength: The organisation number must be 9 digits

svar.required: State whether you expect any changes in your income
State whether the deceased had pensionable income
State whether the deceased has carried out compulsory military service

telefonnummer.required: Telephone number is a required field
telefonnummer.pattern: The telephone number must be 8 digits

epost.required: E-mail address is a required field
epost.pattern: The e-mail address must be valid

oppholderSegINorge.required: You must answer this question about residence

jobbStatus.required: State whether you are in work

hoyesteFullfoerteUtdanning.required: Enter your highest completed level of education

navn.required: Enter the name of the education

startDato.required: Enter the date you started the education

sluttDato.required: Enter the date you ended the education

ingenJobbBeskrivelse.required: Describe your situation in more detail

svar.required: State whether you are waiting for a response to applications for other benefits

beskrivelse.required: State which benefits you have applied for

ytelser.required: State which benefits you have applied for

svar.required: State whether you have applied for contractual early retirement pension (AFP) or a pension from others
State whether you receive a pension from a country other than Norway

bruttobeloepPrAar.required: Enter gross amount in the currency of the country

foedselsnummer.duplicate: This national identity number has already been entered

nySivilstatusEtterDoedsfallet.required: You must answer this question about your marital status

hattBarnEllerVaertGift.required: State whether you have or have had children together or whether you have been married

fornavn.required: Enter your cohabiting partner’s first name(s)

etternavn.required: Enter your cohabiting partner’s family name

foedselsnummer.required: Enter your cohabiting partner’s Norwegian national identity number

svar.required: State whether your cohabiting partner has any income
State whether the person is a resident in a country other than Norway

gravidEllerNyligFoedt.required: State whether you are expecting a child or have children who are not listed in the Norwegian National Registry

yrke.required: You must answer this question about your occupation

stilling.required: You must answer this question about your position

startDato.required: You must provide a start date

sluttDato.required: You must provide an end date

ansettelsesforhold.required: You must answer this question about your employment

heltidDeltid.required: You must state whether the position is full-time or part-time

stillingsprosent.required: Employment percentage is a required field
stillingsprosent.pattern: The employment percentage must be entered in digits (0–99)

arbeidsgiver.navn.required: Employer’s name is a required field
arbeidsgiver.adresse.required: Employer’s address is a required field

inntekt.bruttoArbeidsinntektPrMd.required: Gross earned income is a required field
inntekt.personinntektFraNaeringPrAr.required: Personal income from self-employment is a required field

startDato.required: Start date is a required field

svar.required: State whether you expect any changes in your income

utbetalingsInformasjon.bankkontoType.required: You must choose whether you want the money to be paid into a Norwegian bank account or a foreign bank account

kontonummer.required: Norwegian bank account number is a required field (11 digits)
kontonummer.pattern: Account number not valid. It must have 11 digits.

utbetalingsInformasjon.utenlandskBankNavn.required: The name of the foreign bank is a required field
utbetalingsInformasjon.utenlandskBankAdresse.required: The address of the foreign bank is a required field

iban.required: IBAN number is a required field

swift.required: The bank’s SWIFT code or BIC is a required field

svar.required: State whether you want to use a different bank account number for payment of children’s pension

kontonummer.required: Norwegian bank account number is a required field (11 digits)
kontonummer.pattern: Account number not valid. It must have 11 digits.

svar.required: State whether you want tax to be deducted from the children’s pension

dagligOmsorg.required: State whether you have the daily care for the child

svar.required: State whether a guardian has been appointed for the child

foedselsnummer.required: Enter the guardian’s Norwegian national identity number

brukerLoggesUt.alert: You will be signed out within 5 minutes
